text: Yaqeen rakkho, jin logon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya aur kufr hi ki haalat mein jaan di unmein se koi agar apne aap ko saza se bachane ke liye rooh-e-zameen bhar kar bhi sona(gold) fidye (expiation) mein de to usey qabool na kiya jayege, aisey logon ke liye dardnaak saza tayyar hai aur woh apna koi madadgaar na payenge
